title: Krasner, Norman...beloved husband of Irma
brief_description: A film without dialogue employing the universal language of comedy to capture the tribulations of a man attempting to use a pay toilet. Written by James Herbert. Cast includes Douglas Macintosh, David Thompson and David Kelly.
